body: This is just tragedy. Man... I feel so bad for the MC, toyed around like that...
For the last time all you have to do is fukushuu the bitch and the bastard by fucking their loved ones or someone that they care about that is close to them.
Lmao I love NTR but I'm tired LOL always like this having s*x in front of your girlfriend or childhood friend but I love the artstyle
I think she was chad-kuns from the beginning and only approached him cuz she was told to lol feels bad kid but she a slut.
